mapper.select: /* CmpxInfoMapper.xml, searchCmpxBasicInfoList,이용권 기본 정보 조회 , 김형식/SK플래닛, 2015-05-07 */ SELECT PD.PROD_ID as cmpxProdId , DC.PROD_NM as cmpxProdNm , (CASE WHEN FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD !='OR004305' THEN PD.PROD_GRD_CD ELSE '' END) AS PROD_GRD_CD , UP.USE_PERIOD_UNIT_CD , UP.USE_PERIOD , CM.FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD as cmpxProdClsfCd , (CASE WHEN FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD !='OR004305' THEN UP.POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD ELSE '' END ) AS POSS_LEND_CLSF_CD , (CASE WHEN FREE_PASS_CLSF_CD !='OR004305' THEN CM.SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD ELSE '' END ) AS SERIES_BOOK_CLSF_CD , PD.DRM_YN FROM TB_DP_PROD PD , TB_DP_CMPX_PROD CM , TB_DP_PROD_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_USE_POLICY UP WHERE PD.PROD_ID = #{prodId} AND PD.PROD_ID = CM.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = DC.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND PD.USE_POLICY_ID = UP.USE_POLICY_ID AND DC.LANG_CD = #{lang} AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}
